summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1983, for the improvement of Second Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks thereon, with the necessary appurtenances for the proper surface drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 20388, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
